channel.title: Fantasy Baseball on Kyle Kumbier
channel.description: Recent content in Fantasy Baseball on Kyle Kumbier

item.title: The Lost Season: Week 02
item.description: In an alternate reality, we’ve still got bench-clearing brawls! Around The League Top Stories League suspends Dexter Fowler (5 games) and Blake Trienen (3 games) for involvement in Cards-Angels brawl League suspends Carl Edwards Jr. (6 games) and Cesar Puello (3 games) for fight in Red Sox-Mariners game Justin Upton hits 300th career home run in 4-2 win against Tigers on 4/11 Gerrit Cole dominates Athletics in today’s 8-1 New York victory, strikes out 15 over 7 innings

item.title: The Lost Season: Week 01
item.description: In an alternate reality, baseball is finally back! Around The League Top Stories Clayton Kershaw throws no-hitter against San Francisco Giants on 3/27 George Springer signs 5-year $137 million extension with Houston Astros Ryan Braun hits 3 HR in Brewers 8-5 victory over Phillies on 4/4 Rockies’ German Marquez out for season with serious elbow injury in Opening Day start Standings Fantasy Team News Skaggs to Riches (Kyler) Acquisitions

item.title: The Lost Season: Introduction
item.description: There’s no crying in baseball! If you’re like me, you’re incredibly sad that baseball has been halted. And not just baseball, FANTASY BASEBALL. We wait months for the draft! We finally build our teams! And now we wait… indefinitely. Who knows, the 2020 season may never come. That idea of not having something to root for is scary. Not on my watch. Fortunately for all of us, the newest version of Out of the Park Baseball (OOTP) was released on March 20, 2020.
